preqs: ATS2123 or ATS2809This unit is only available to students enrolled in a Bachelor of Music single or double degree - Music performance specialisation.

rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course version {0821, 1185, 1497, 2025, 3054, 3717, 3774, A2003, A2004, B2022, D3004, D30041, D30042, L3006, S2005} and Any co-req unit set {MUSIC-PERF, PERFORM01})
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2123, ATS2809}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2123, ATS2809}

description: This unit consolidates advanced skills in music performance developed in ATS2123 Performance 4. Students further develop technical and performance skills by studying technically focused repertoire drawn from the literature of the student's principal instrument or voice. The choice of repertoire should consolidate and go beyond the level of skills attained in ATS2123 Performance 4. This prepares students for the repertoire-based focus of the final unit in the sequence, ATS3137 Performance 6.
